it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.utils

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.utils.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class should be used only for debug purpose
    because uses deprecated methods. Helps to read text from files and to generate
    Properties object
    Version:
    3.2
    Author:
    Antonello Calabrò
